titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2506) making appropriations for foreign operations, export financing, and related programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2002, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-146, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2506 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. The amendments printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole. Measure will be read by paragraph. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 56.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 199.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/18/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 2506 (FY 2002 foreign operations, export financing, and related programs appropriations).
